translations: [有化]乙烯基；唱片（vinyl 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Timecode Vinyls are special records that you can play on any standard turntable.
sentences.translation: 时间码乙烯基是特别记录，您可以发挥任何标准转台。

sentences.sentence: We use only the finest quality, top grain hides available. No inferior split grain leathers or vinyls are ever used.
sentences.translation: 我们只选用优质的顶层皮革，决不选用次等的二层皮革或乙烯基皮革。

sentences.sentence: Many youngish, trendy middle- class couples in search of an identity now 'collect' vinyls as if to show how different they are.
sentences.translation: 很多年轻时尚的中产阶级夫妻为了彰显身份，现在都搜集黑胶唱片，以此显示他们与众不同。
